channel.title: Ubuntu
channel.description: I'm trying to switch my server to UBuntu, but I get this in terminal: [code=JAVA]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server/java Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server.java at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:217) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:205) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:321) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:294) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:266) . Program will exit.ain class: server.java : not found [/code] Lol, I have a fucking server class :)

item.title: Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

I’m trying to switch my server to UBuntu, but I get this in terminal: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server/java Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server.java at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:217) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:205) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:321) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:294) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:266) . Program will exit.ain class: server.java : not found Lol, I have a fucking server class
